item.title: Scheduled Update 1/23/2019
item.dc:creator: CG_SBCrumb
item.description:
Hi Holotable Heroes!
We have minor update for today, 1/23/19.

FIXES
  • SHIP - Fixed a bug that caused Han's Millennium Falcon to be targetable while having the "Outmaneuver" buff and stealth while other allies active are also stealthed

item.title: Content Update 1/16/2019
item.dc:creator: CG_SBCrumb
item.description:
Hi Holotable Heroes!
Here is all the new content you’ll find after today’s update,1/16/19.

NEW CHARACTERS

For more info on these units, check out the kit reveals and strategy guides below:
  • Han’s Millenium Falcon

CHANGES
  • Gear XII salvage and MK 2 Pulse Modulators have been added to the Shard Store.
  • C-3PO's "Oh My Goodness!" special ability will now prefer to target allies that do not currently have Translation. If all allies have Translation it will select a random target.

EVENTS
Flight of the Falcon
BOUNTY HUNTER ships have been dispatched by DARTH VADER to find and capture a group of Rebel ships including HAN'S MILLENNIUM FALCON.
Succeed and earn blueprints for Han Solo's iconic ship!
  • Event begins: January 17th
  • Level requirements for event: 60+
  • Minimum Requirement: Bounty Hunter Ships(1-Star for tier 1 scaling up to 7-Star for tier 7) and a Capital Ship that meets the Star requirement for each tier of the event

SHARD SHUFFLE
These characters or ships are now available in the following locations:
Anakin’s Eta-2 Starfighter
  • Anakin’s Eta-2 Starfighter is now available on Fleet Battles 1-B Hard. Anakin’s Starfighter is an addition to Fleet Battles 1-B Hard and does not replace any possible rewards currently available there.

Canderous Ordo
  • Canderous Ordo is available on Cantina Battles 5-C. Canderous Ordo will replace Finn, the character currently on Cantina Battles 5-C. Finn will continue to be farmable in Cantina Battles 3-E and Light Side Battles 7-A Hard.

Bastila Shan (Fallen)
  • Bastila Shan (Fallen)is now available on Dark Side Battles 7-A Hard. Bastila Shan (Fallen) will replace Poe Dameron, the character currently on Dark Side Battles 7-A Hard. Poe Dameron will continue to be farmable in Light Side Battles 7-B Hard.

PACKS AND BUNDLES
FREEDOM FIGHTER FACTION PACK
Power up your Rebel ships with a FREEDOM FIGHTER FACTION PACK.
Each pack awards 1 card of ship blueprints worth 10-100 blueprints for Rebel ships.
Possible Ships:
  • Biggs Darklighter’s X-wing
  • Bistan’s U-wing
  • Cassian’s U-wing
  • Ghost
  • Phantom II
  • Wedge Antilles’s X-wing
  • Date available: January 24th
  • 799 Crystals
  • Minimum Level requirements: 60+
  • Purchase limit: 10 per day

FREEDOM FIGHTER ULTIMATE BUNDLE
Power up your fleets with this Freedom Fighter bundle, which includes Ship Blueprints for 6 Rebel ships.
Includes:
  • Cassian’s U-wing (x80)
  • Bistan’s U-wing (x60)
  • Ghost (x60)
  • Phantom II (x30)
  • Biggs Darklighter’s X-wing (x25)
  • Wedge Antilles’s X-wing (x25)
BONUS: This bundle also includes Ship Building Materials, Enhancement Droids, Ship Ability Materials, and Reinforcement Materials to immediately power up these ships to Ship level: 40
  • Date available: January 24th
  • Minimum Level requirements: 60+

FIXES
  • CHARACTER - Fixed a bug where L3-37 could save droid allies with "For the Droids" after L3-37 was defeated.
  • CHARACTER - Fixed a bug which prevented Cartel Spy (PvE Unit) from using Taunt correctly.
  • CHARACTER - Fixed a bug that prevented Bastila Shan (Fallen) from being the source of the effects on “Fear's” Stun when it expires.
  • CHARACTER - Fixed a bug where Nute Gunray's "Backroom Subterfuge" upgrade path tier 3 incorrectly stated the amount of Turn Meter gained on a Critical Hit as 20% instead of 30%.
  • CHARACTER - Fixed a bug where Death Trooper's "Death Trooper Grenade" would not prevent Barriss Offee from healing when it critically hit when Healing Immunity was applied.
  • CHARACTER - Fixed a bug which prevented Bastila Shan (Fallen) from recovering Max Health after applying Corrupted Battle Meditation to enemies while Emperor Palpatine is in the leader slot.
  • CHARACTER - Updated Jedi Knight Revan’s “Savior” description to clarify that Jedi allies that are rescued by “Savior” cannot be defeated for the rest of that turn.
  • CHARACTER - Fixed a bug where Death Trooper could apply Death Mark with "Terminate" in The Pit and Tank Takedown raids in certain phases when there are no defeated enemies.
  • CHARACTER - Fixed a bug where Darth Nihilus would not recover Max Health when he inflicts a debuff at the start of his turn with his "Wound in the Force" with Emperor Palpatine in the leader slot.
  • QUEST - Vandor Chewbacca and Zaalbar now are counted for the "Wookiee Hunter" quest.

<<MEGATHREAD>>
